notes:
Czech models for MorphoDiTa, providing morphological analysis, morphological generation and part-of-speech tagging.

The morphological dictionary is created from MorfFlex CZ and the PoS tagger is trained on PDT (Prague Dependency Treebank).
title: Czech Models (MorfFlex CZ + PDT) for MorphoDiTa
